Text: Great quality. Thanks for the upload :)

Many thanks sliptv for all your hard work on this.
I had a USA set and actually had to skip to series 6 as the canned laughter made series 1-5 (almost) unwatchable. At least they toned down the canned cr*p from series 6 onwards.
I raise my Martini glass to you...
whats wronged with the canned laughter? thats what I grew up on. I cant imagine how boring and unfunny mash would be wo the laughing in the background!
Thanks a lot, can't wait to watch the old show again.

To all the nay Sayers who object to the missing canned laughter. The show was ORIGINALLY meant to be shown WITHOUT the canned cr*p. (I mean really, they (the network) had recycled the canned laughter from the fifties) After the success of the first two years, the network agreed to a "Chuckle track" instead of the laugh track. Still, It was annoying. (No laugh track needs to tell ME what's funny). Once again, and I have already done this.. MANY PROPS to the uploader of these torrents!! kudos!
